fixes.name: WACS (bps)
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR numerator = SUMX(
    'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
    'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM] * 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Coll Spread]
)
VAR denominator = SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM])
RETURN
numerator / denominator * 100
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated Tableau SUM([Ut. US MM]*[Coll Spread]) to DAX SUMX over the same table for row-wise multiplication, kept SUM([Ut. US MM]) as SUM, and multiplied the result by 100. All column references use 'TableName'[ColumnName] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
